resources.string: Qamba kabusha i-SHIELD
"Uhlelo lokusebenza oluthile lufuna ukwenza i-SHIELD ibonakale kwamanye amadivayisi we-Bluetooth kumasekhondi angu-%1$d. Uyavuma?"
Ulwazi lwe-SHIELD
Uma uvumela ukuzulazula kwedatha, ungathola amashaji amakhulu okuzulazula kwedatha!\n\nLesi silungiselelwa sithinta bonke abasebenzisi kule SHIELD.
Bethela i-SHIELD
Dinga i-PIN yenombolo noma iphasiwedi ukubonisa umbhalo wemfihlo kwi-SHIELD ngazo zonke izikhathi lapho uyivula

Ungabethela ama-akhawunti wakho, izilungiselelo, ulande izinhlelo zokusebenza nedatha yazo, imidiya, namanye amafayela. Uma usubethele i-SHIELD, udinga ukuthayipha i-PIN yenombolo noma iphasiwedi ukususa ukubhala ngekhodi ngaso isikathi ukhanyisa. Awukwazi ukususa ukubhala ngakhodi kwi-SHIELD ngaphandle kokwenza kabusha idatha yakho yenkampani, sula yonke idatha yakho.\n\nUkubhala ngekhodi kuthatha ihora noma ngaphezulu. Kufanele uqale ngebhtri elishajiwe futhi ugcine i-SHIELD iplakiwe kuze kuphele ukubethela. Uma uphazamisa inqubo yokubethela, uzolahlekelwa enye noma yonke idatha yakho.
Bethela i-SHIELD

Umsebenzi wokubhala ngekhodi awubuyiseleki emuva futhi uma uwuphazamisa, uzolahlekelwa idatha. Ukubhala ngekhodi kuthatha ihora noma ngaphezulu, phakathi kwesikhathi lapho i-SHIELD izoqala kabusha kambalwa.
Linda ngenkathi i-SHIELD ibhalwa ngemfihlo. ^1% kuphelile.

Ukubethela kuphazamisekile futhi ngeke kusaphela. Ngenxa yalokho, akusafinyeleleki kwidatha ekwi-SHIELD.\n\n Ukuze uphinde usebenzise i-SHIELD, kufanele isethwe kabusha ngokwasembonini. Uma ususetha i-SHIELD emuva kokuba isethwe kabusha, uzothola ithuba lokubuyisa nanoma iyiphi idatha eyayilondolozwe kwi-akhawunti yakho yakwa-Google.
%1$s izokhishwa ekwebelaneni noxhumano lwe-Inthanethi yale SHIELD.
Vumela ukushintshanisa kwedatha uma i-SHIELD ithinta enye idivayisi
ISEXWAYISO: Ungahle uthole amashaji edatha enkampani yenethiwekhi angeziwe.\n\nUkusethwa kwe-SHIELD kungadinga umsebenzi wenethiwekhi omkhulu.
ISEXWAYISO: I-SHIELD ngeke ikwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isofthiwe yakho isesikhathini samanje.
I-SHIELD ayikwazanga ukuxhuma kule nethiwekhi ye-Wi-Fi.
I-SHIELD ayidokhiwe
Udinga ukufaka idoki kwi-SHIELD ngaphambi kokusetha umsindo wedoki
Dlala umsindo lapho ufaka noma ukhipha i-SHIELD kwidokhi
Dlala umsindo lapho ufaka noma ukhipha i-SHIELD kwidokhi
Shintsha ukujikeleleza ngokuzenzakalela lapho ujikelezisa i-SHIELD
Shintsha ukujikeleleza ngokuzenzakalela lapho ujikelezisa i-SHIELD
Udinga i-PIN ukusebenzisa i-SHIELD
Udinga i-PIN ukusebenzisa i-SHIELD
Isimo se-SHIELD
Isimo sebhetri, inethiwekhi, nolunye ulwazi
I-MDN
Isula yonke idatha ekwi-SHIELD

"Lokhu kuzosula yonke idatha ekwi-SHIELD kustoreji sangaphakathi, kufaka:


Ne-akhawunti yakho ye-Google

Isistimu nedatha yohlelo namasethingi

Izinhlelo zokusebenza ezilayishiwe"
Setha kabusha i-SHIELD
Ukwabelana noxhumano lwe-Inthanethi yale SHIELD
Ukwabelana noxhumano lwe-Inthanethi yale SHIELD kudivayisi eyo-1
Ukwabelana noxhumano lwe-Inthanethi yale SHIELD kumadivayisi angu-%1$d
Akukho ukwabelana noxhumano lwe-Inthanethi yale SHIELD
Vumela izinhlelo zokusebenza ukusebenzisa i-GPS kwi-SHIELD ukukhomba indawo yakho
Mayelana ne-SHIELD

I-SHIELD kanye nemininingwane yakho kusengozini yokuthi kuhlaselwe yizinhlelo zokusebenza ezivela kwimithombo engaziwa. Uyavuma ukuthi uwena wedwa onesibophezelo sanoma yikuphi ukulimala kwe-SHIELD noma ukulahleka kwemininingo okungabangelwa ukusetshenziswa kwalezi zinhlelo.
Lolu hlelo lungasebenzisa lokhu okulandelayo kwi-SHIELD:

Lolu hlelo lungasebenzisa lokhu okulandelayo kwi-SHIELD. Ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukusebenza kahle nokunciphisa ukusebenza kwememori, ezinye zalezi zimvume zitholakala ku-%1$s ngoba isebenza ngenqubo efanayo ne-%2$s:
Hambisa kuye kwi-SHIELD
Uma umisa le sevisi, ezinye izici ze-SHIELD zingase ziyeke ukusebenza kahle kuze kucishwe amandla futhi aphinde avulwe.
Ulwazi lwe-SHIELD
I-SHIELD ayenzi lutho
I-SHIELD
Ibethri iyasebenza lapho i-SHIELD ingenzi lutho
Ukukhipha le akhawunti kuzosusa yonke imiyalezo yakho, oxhumana nabo, nenye idatha kwi-SHIELD!

Le akhawunti ifunwa yizinhlelo ezithile. Ungakwazi ukukususa kuphela ngokuthi ulungise kabusha i-SHIELD ibuyele kulokho okwakwenziwe lapho yakhiwe khona (okususa yonke imininingo yomuntu) kumaSethingi > iBhekhaphu nokulungisa kabusha.

oma iziphi izinguquko ozenzayo kuma-akhawunti wakho kuwebhu zizokopishelwa ngokuzenzakalela kwi-SHIELD yakho.

Amanye ama-akhawunti angakopisha ngokuzenzakalela noma iziphi izinguquko ozenzayo kwi-SHILED kuya kuwebhu. I-akhawunti yakwa-Google isebenza ngale ndlela.

Ukuze ukhethe ukuthi uluphi uhlobo lolwazi ongaluvumelanisa ngaphakathi kwe-akhawunti ngayinye, iya kuziLungiselelo > ama-Akhawunti.

Uxhumo lwedatha yakho yeselula luzokhubazwa uma uma umkhawulo ocacisiwe usufinyelelwe.\n\nNjengoba ukusetshenziswa kwedatha kukalwa nge-SHIELD yakho, kanti nenkampani yakho yenethiwekhi ungabhekana nokusetshenziswa ngokwehlukile, naka ukusebenzisa umkhawulo olandelanayo.

Uma ugwema ukusetshenziswa kwedatha yangemuva kuselula, ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza kanye namasevisi ngeke kusebenze ngaphandle uma uxhumaniseke enethiwekhini ye-Wifi.\n\nLolu lungiselelo luthinta bonke abasebenzisi abakule SHIELD.
%2$s: mayelana %1$s esetshenzisiwe, njengoba ikalwe yi-SHIELD. Ukusetshenziswa kwedatha yenkampani yenethiwekhi yakho kungahluka.
Umnikazi we-SHIELD kuphela ongaphatha abasebenzisi.
Uzolahlekelwa yisikhala nedatha kule SHIELD. Ungasihlehlisa lesi senzo.
Lesi sikhala somsebenzisi nedatha kuzonyamalala kule SHIELD. Ungasihlehlisa lesi senzo.
Le sethingi ithinta bonke abasebenzisi kule SHIELD.
